> <OLD>
>
> Nightshift watched as the cloud of insects flew out of sight.  Yet he was
> still shaking from his ordeal.
>
> " I think they got shook up too, but Primus knows where they're headed. "
>
> He turns to Wolfgang.
>
> " I never told anyone else this, but when I was in stasis, I had a dream.
> But it wasn't just any regular dream.  It was raining and I was standn' out
> over the Ark, lookn' up at the sky.  It was almost as black as my fur, but
> through that darkness, I saw light.  Like lightning, through the storm
> clouds.  It shimmered like lightning, but then somethn' broke through those
> clouds.  Well, almost completely broke through, and behind the thin cover, I
> could see my big buddie's shape, with his long tail trailn' behind him, and
> then, what sounded like thunder came outa his mouth and when he roared, I
> could see pebbles jump'n on the ground, and feel the vibration under my
> paws.  And after he roared, the sky opened up and you could see this really
> bright light kinda filtering through on the ground.  Then, I woke up."
>
> He puts a paw on Wolfgang's shoulder.
>
> "Master Yoketron believed that dreams that seemed almost real, were
> reflections of what was ta come in our lives.  I have a really good feeln'
> we're all gonna come outa this on top.  And things will get better.  I know
> they will.  Because when you hear that thunder through the clouds, you know
> change is in the forecast."

<NEW>

WOLFGANG looked at NIGHTSHIFT, "You sound like one of those priests of
Primus." He said as nodded. "One who is loyal to his friend." He
smiled, "Not too bad a combination I guess." He said as he look
upwards at the last of the energy motes that were moving into the
skies.

"If the queen is in that mess then she went out in pieces." POLAR CLAW
said as he also looked up. Each one of the motes that had escaped
varied from the size of a Cybertronian fist up to about the size of
one's head.

"Perhaps." PROWL said, "But we have no idea what we have released."

WOLFGANG nodded as LORD ELDER's words came over the radio. "Great. We
go from combat duty to repair mechs."

POLAR CLAW looked around at the others, "Well you heard him, we have
work to do." he looked over at RAMULUS, "Watch the craft, we have no
idea what else is going on. And we are going to need an easy way outta
here after this trip."

RAMULUS nodded as he stepped off the craft.

Meanwhile PROWL and WOLFGANG prepared to go inside again, hopefully
this time without a battle.

(TAG)

- Preston
